snippet.title: So, This Vampire Walks into a Bar Release trailer
snippet.description:
Unlucky Planet Games is excited to announce So, This Vampire Walks into a Bar, coming Summer of 2024.

Wishlist Today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2897830/So_This_Vampire_Walks_into_a_Bar/

Join our broke protagonist Jackie, who, after a workplace accident, will never look the same again. Jackie desperately tries to make ends meet by working in an unusual bar, despite having no experience at all!

#paranormalgames #visualnovel #game  #gametrailers #mixology #gamerelease #indiegame  #vampire
